recipe.title: The Only Marinade You'll Ever Need
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon coarse salt (kosher or sea), or to taste
3 cloves garlic, crushed with the side of a cleaver or minced
1/4 cup coarsely chopped fresh basil, cilantro, dill, oregano, or a mix of all four
instructions: Combine the lemon juice, hot pepper flakes, cracked pepper, and salt in a nonreactive (glass, ceramic, or stainless steel) bowl and whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the lemon zest, garlic, parsley and basil. Stir or whisk in the olive oil. The virtue of this marinade is its freshness: Use it within 1 to 2 hours of making. Stir again before using.
